body: Are applications available? There isn't any guide or something and no posts in '' Staff Applications''!
body_tagged: Are applications available? There isn't any guide or something and no posts in '' Staff Applications''!
title: One question

replies.body: I believe they won't be available until around July.
replies.body_tagged: I believe they won't be available until around July.

replies.body: The apps are not open ATMATM
replies.body_tagged: The apps are not open ATMATM

replies.body: Pretty sure he meant at the moment but he said it twice.
replies.body_tagged: Pretty sure he meant at the moment but he said it twice.

replies.body:
Staff applications are not currently open. They were open near the end of March, and there are still many people who are under review, so many of the high ranking staff members are very busy dealing with that.
However, the next "round" of staff application are likely to open up in July (It may or may not be accurate), and when they do reopen, you may click on the "Staff Applications" section under Administration and post your application there.
